name: Born of the Solstice
description:
Legend tells of a time of fear and uncertainty... a time when chaos ruled the earth.. In order to put a cease to the destruction, two children would be born with the gift of light. One born from the light of the sun, and the other the glow of the moon.  Together, only they can stop what is to come. 

Luna and Sol, Though opposites in nature, must partner together and journey across the land of Celestia. Battle monsters and combat dark forces at every corner. Along their journey they will encounter wonderful and terrifying beings, and they need your help to overcome all the obstacles!

Features:

- A real time, action battle system.

- Approximately 45 Minutes of Gameplay.
